subject: Adding new field 'tag_time' to tag_map table.
commitMessage:
Adding new field 'tag_time' to tag_map table.

Used to store the time when a tag was added to one media entry.
media-content has a related path doing the actual job (from every call
to media_tag_update_to_db()).

Change-Id: Id3192ccb5877554e59222064385de4360d0a00ed
Signed-off-by: Gustavo Lima Chaves <gustavo.lima.chaves@intel.com>

subject: Adding a new field -- 'cover_image' -- to the table folder.
commitMessage:
Adding a new field -- 'cover_image' -- to the table folder.

This commits comes along with one on media-content, introducing
media_folder_{set,get}_cover_image() API calls.

Change-Id: I22f7c36e69d7123c384a2189a443ec02b93e0948
Signed-off-by: Gustavo Lima Chaves <gustavo.lima.chaves@intel.com>
